ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Ents (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Saebbi and Napon
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Saebbi and Napons mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1407085855
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/LordoftheRimsEnts
- Added support for Combat Extended
--- Original Description --- Adds Ents to RimWorld. Requires JecsTools and Humanoid Alien Framework.
Textures were made by Napon. XML done by Saebbi.
Regeneration Assembly by ChJees, Texture for Blood by Filthy Peasant.
